name: JIRA__ACCESSIBLE_RESOURCES
description: Get the cloudid for all accessible Atlassian sites. This is required before making other API calls to specific sites.

name: JIRA__PROJECTS
description: Get a list of projects from Jira.

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site. You can get this by calling the JIRA__GET_ACCESSIBLE_RESOURCES function.

expand.description: Use expand to include additional information in the response. This parameter accepts a comma-separated list.

name: JIRA__SEARCH_ISSUES
description: Search for issues in Jira using JQL (Jira Query Language).

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site. You can get this by calling the JIRA__GET_ACCESSIBLE_RESOURCES function.

jql.description: JQL query string. For example: project = AC AND status = Open

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in the page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return for each issue. For example: summary,description,status

name: JIRA__CREATE_ISSUE
description: Create a new issue in Jira with project assignment, issue type, and detailed information for tracking

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

key.description: Project key where the issue will be created

description.description: Detailed description of the issue in Atlassian Document Format

name.description: Issue type (Bug, Story, Task, Epic, etc.)
Priority level (Highest, High, Medium, Low, Lowest)

name: JIRA__UPDATE_ISSUE
description: Update an existing issue's fields, status, assignment, or other properties in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

issue_key.description: Issue key or ID to update (e.g., PROJECT-123)

name: JIRA__ISSUE
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific issue in Jira including fields, comments, and attachments

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

issue_key.description: Issue key or ID to retrieve (e.g., PROJECT-123)

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include

name: JIRA__TRANSITION_ISSUE
description: Transition an issue through workflow states (To Do → In Progress → Done) in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

name.description: Resolution name (Fixed, Won't Do, Duplicate, etc.)

name: JIRA__ADD_COMMENT
description: Add a comment to an existing issue in Jira for collaboration and communication tracking

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

issue_key.description: Issue key to add comment to (e.g., PROJECT-123)

name: JIRA__BOARDS
description: Retrieve agile boards from Jira Software for scrum and kanban workflow management

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

maxResults.description: Maximum number of boards to return

name: JIRA__SPRINTS
description: Retrieve sprints from a Jira agile board for scrum project management and iteration planning

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

board_id.description: Board ID to get sprints from

maxResults.description: Maximum number of sprints to return

name: JIRA__CREATE_SPRINT
description: Create a new sprint in Jira agile board for organizing work iterations and development cycles

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

originBoardId.description: Board ID where this sprint belongs

name: JIRA__USERS
description: Retrieve users from Jira instance for assignment and collaboration management

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

query.description: Query string to search users by name or email

maxResults.description: Maximum number of users to return

name: JIRA__ISSUE_TYPES
description: Retrieve available issue types (Bug, Story, Task, Epic) for creating and categorizing issues in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

name: JIRA__PRIORITIES
description: Retrieve available priority levels (Highest, High, Medium, Low, Lowest) for issue prioritization in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

name: JIRA__WORKFLOWS
description: Retrieve workflow schemes and transitions for understanding issue lifecycle and status management in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

maxResults.description: Maximum number of workflows to return

name: JIRA__SPRINT_ISSUES
description: Retrieve all issues assigned to a specific sprint for sprint planning and progress tracking

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

sprint_id.description: Sprint ID to get issues from

maxResults.description: Maximum number of issues to return

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include

name: JIRA__CREATE_PROJECT
description: Create a new project in Jira with specified configuration, lead, and project type for team organization

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

projectTemplateKey.description: Template to use for project creation

leadAccountId.description: Account ID of the project lead

name: JIRA__ISSUE_TRANSITIONS
description: Get available workflow transitions for a specific issue to understand possible status changes

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

issue_key.description: Issue key to get transitions for (e.g., PROJECT-123)

name: JIRA__ASSIGN_ISSUE_TO_SPRINT
description: Add issues to a specific sprint for agile planning and iteration management in Jira

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

sprint_id.description: Sprint ID to assign issues to

issues.description: Array of issue keys to assign to the sprint

name: JIRA__BOARD_ISSUES
description: Retrieve all issues on a specific agile board with their current status and assignment information

cloudid.description: Atlassian Cloud ID for your Jira site

board_id.description: Board ID to get issues from

maxResults.description: Maximum number of issues to return

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include
